steps.title: Kill Hillock
steps.description: Kill Hillock at the end of the Twilight Strand

steps.title: Talk to Tarkleigh
steps.description: Enter Lioneye's Watch and talk to Tarkleigh to receive the reward

steps.title: Get Rolling Magma
steps.description: Complete Enemy at the Gate quest to get Rolling Magma gem

reward.name: Rolling Magma
reward.usage_notes: Early clear until Arc. Use with Added Lightning Damage

steps.gear_focus: Look for 2-3 linked items with blue sockets

steps.title: Get Movement & Support
steps.description: Complete Mercy Mission and Breaking Some Eggs for Arcane Surge and Frostblink

reward.name: Arcane Surge
reward.usage_notes: Link to Frostblink for mana sustain, keep at level 1

vendor.name: Frostblink
vendor.usage_notes: Your main movement skill for the rest of the game

steps.gear_focus: Need blue sockets for movement setup

steps.title: Get Added Lightning Damage
steps.description: Complete The Caged Brute for Added Lightning Damage support

reward.name: Added Lightning Damage
reward.usage_notes: Link to Rolling Magma for extra lightning damage

steps.gear_focus: Need 2+ blue sockets for Rolling Magma setup
steps.currency_notes: Keep upgrading weapon as you find better ones

steps.title: Kill Hailrake & Get Arc
steps.description: Kill Hailrake, get Quicksilver Flask, complete Siren's Cadence for Arc gem

reward.name: Arc
reward.usage_notes: Replace Rolling Magma with Arc as your main skill

steps.gear_focus: Switch to Arc as main skill, need 2+ blue sockets
steps.currency_notes: Use Quicksilver Flask for movement speed

steps.title: Get Wave of Conviction
steps.description: Get Wave of Conviction from Intruders in Black quest (Templar reward, buy from vendor)

vendor.name: Wave of Conviction
vendor.usage_notes: Use before Arc to expose enemies to lightning damage

steps.currency_notes: Consider buying gear upgrades from vendors

steps.title: Get Desecrate
steps.description: Complete Intruders in Black for Desecrate (Witch reward)
steps.gear_focus: Focus on mana and spell damage gear

steps.title: Get Flammability & Wrath
steps.description: Complete Lost in Love for Flammability, purchase Wrath

reward.name: Flammability
reward.usage_notes: Curse for fire damage builds, can be used situationally

vendor.name: Wrath
vendor.usage_notes: Activate for lightning damage bonus to support Arc

vendor.name: Determination
vendor.usage_notes: Defensive aura for armor and physical damage reduction

steps.gear_focus: Need mana reservation for auras, consider reduced mana gems
steps.currency_notes: Visit Siosa in Library after A Fixture of Fate for missing gems

steps.title: Get Armageddon Brand & Cremation
steps.description: Complete Sever the Right Hand for Armageddon Brand and Cremation (Witch rewards)

reward.name: Armageddon Brand
reward.usage_notes: Alternative fire skill for different situations

vendor.name: Cremation
vendor.usage_notes: Single target fire skill, works with Desecrate

steps.gear_focus: Arc remains main skill, these are alternatives for different content

steps.title: Get Archmage Support
steps.description: Complete The Eternal Nightmare for Archmage Support and Spell Echo

reward.name: Archmage Support
reward.usage_notes: Add to Arc for massive damage scaling with mana

vendor.name: Spell Echo
vendor.usage_notes: Link to Arc for cast speed and damage

steps.gear_focus: Need 4+ linked item for Arc + supports
steps.currency_notes: Major power spike - Arc + Archmage + Spell Echo + Added Lightning
